register.description: This register contains the IP revision code

bitfield.description: IP Revision

register.description: This register controls the various parameters of the communication interface

bitfield.description: Idle Mode

bitenum.description: Force-idle. An idle request is acknowledged unconditionally
No-idle. An idle request is never acknowledged
Smart-idle. Acknowledgement to an idle request is given based on the internal activity of the module based on the internal activity of the module

register.description: The message register stores the next to be read message of the mailbox. Reads remove the message from the FIFO queue.

bitfield.description: Message in Mailbox

register.description: The interrupt status register has the raw status for each event that may be responsible for the generation of an interrupt to the corresponding user - write 1 to a given bit sets this bit. This register is mainly used for debug purpose.

bitfield.description: Write 0's for future compatibility. Read returns 0.

NewMessage Status bit for User u, Mailbox 7

NewMessage Status bit for User u, Mailbox 3

NewMessage Status bit for User u, Mailbox 2
NotFull Status bit for User u, Mailbox 1
NewMessage Status bit for User u, Mailbox 1
NotFull Status bit for User u, Mailbox 0
NewMessage Status bit for User u, Mailbox 0
